name: Troll Warlord
title: Jah'rakal
lore: A savage troll chieftain whose battle frenzy makes him attack with unmatched speed.

berserkerRage.name: Berserker's Rage
berserkerRage.description: Switches between ranged and melee, gaining bonus stats in melee form.

whirlingAxes.name: Whirling Axes
whirlingAxes.description: Throws or spins axes depending on form. Ranged slows, melee blinds.

fervor.name: Fervor
fervor.description: Each consecutive attack on the same target grants bonus attack speed.

battleTrance.name: Battle Trance
battleTrance.description: Enters a battle trance, granting lifesteal and attack speed to Troll and nearby allies.
